extendedInfo.description: An elegant and accurate App for getting prayer timings and Qibla direction, no matter where you are. Its stylish yet easy and convenient interface is designed to make sure that you are kept updated with the pray times.â Auto Silent Mode (For users who may forget to silent mobile in Masjid)â Full screen and Cool Widget for your Wallpaper Desktopâ The next prayer time is highlighted to easily alert & catch the next prayer.â Current time and remaining time for the next prayer is mentioned to help you prepare for the prayer in time.â Easily turn Adhan alarm On/Off for any Salah with a single touch.â Digital magnetic Compass using your phone/tablet sensor will quickly point to the Qiblah direction.â Almost all major cities around the world are covered. If your city is not listed, select the nearest one.â You can change the Azan voice or record your own Athan in your voice .âÂ Salat time of Fajr, Shrook, Zuhr, Asr, Magrib and Ishaâ Best Islamic tool for every Muslim to follow his daily Solat (namaz) in home or Masjid and make Doaa for us.â Can select the Madhab (Hanafi, Shafi, Malki or Hanbali)â Hijri Date (Helpful for non-arab countries to follow month of Ramadhan)â Day Light Saving optionâ Waktu SolatDisclaimer: This Free App is supported by Ads that may be appear within the App or in the notification bar. These Ads will help in continuous development to improve and add more useful features. The App provides option to Remove Ads by a small payment.

reviews.title: Need improvement
reviews.comment: Verygood widgets, acurate qibla and pray time, but lack of alarm reminder such as vibrate/beeb only. And the recorder not work properly
reviews.author: krida patty

reviews.title: Very accurate
reviews.comment: Prayer times are accurate unlike some other apps i hv installed earlier. Qiblat is also accurate. Jazakallah n keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Nazly Jalaluddin

reviews.title: Adhan time problem
reviews.comment: I m living in London but London Mughrib time today 22/06/2013 is 21:25 but it shows 19:44. Pls solve this problem.
reviews.author: Muhammad Nurul Hasan

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Installed program, launched it, but every single time that I select my country (Canada), the program crashes, excerpt for the very first time, when I selected Canada, I got a list of cities, and London wasn\'t one of them. Why would you not have London, which is one of the bigger cities? But like I said, it just kept crashing from that point.
reviews.author: Malek Ali

reviews.comment: Very simple n very accurate app. With compass n adhan alarms, which can be customised per Salaah\tEach Salaah can have an alarm on/off option. Very accurate compass..excellent

reviews.title: Excellent
